DOC.detailed_description: Before research start ( screen ) : After sign consent form , participant ask question find participant research study : - A medical history , include question participant 's physical mental health , current medication , allergy . If test show participant eligible participate research study , participant receive study intervention . If participant meet eligibility criterion , participant able participate research study . - After screen procedure confirm participant eligible participate research study : - Collections Visit One : After screen visit confirms participant eligible participate , participant schedule Collections Visit One . At Collections Visit One , participant complete : - A demographic questionnaire : This include question participant 's age , gender ethnicity . - A series questionnaires : These ask participant 's overall wellness take 30-45 minute complete . - A small blood sample collection : Trained nursing staff take 1.5 tablespoon blood single prick participant 's arm . This procedure take 10-15 minute . This provide sample research test may help investigator 's learn study treatment affect participant 's gene express . - OPTIONAL - Bone marrow , plasma serum collection : This collection optional described detail Section O . Trained nursing staff take 1 tablespoon bone marrow standard bone marrow aspirate procedure . This procedure take 20-30 minute complete , however time use get everything ready ( prepare skin ) well 5-10 minute reserve relaxing procedure complete . This provide sample research test may help investigator learn study treatment affect participant 's disease . All intervention visit take place Benson-Henry Institute Mind Body Medicine Massachusetts General Hospital . - During intervention ( follow period Immediate Group ) , participant ask practice participant learn intervention listen 20-minute audio CD daily . Additionally , participant ask keep track daily practice fill online paper log . During 3RP session , clinician address barrier problem participant may daily practice help problem solve participant . - Collections Visit Two : This visit Collections Visit One . - Collections Visit Three : During visit , participant complete : - A series questionnaires : These ask participant 's overall wellness , take 30-45 minute complete . - A small blood sample collection : Trained nursing staff take 1.5 tablespoon blood single prick arm . This procedure take 10-15 minute . DOC.criteria: Participants must confirm highrisk monoclonal gammopathy undetermined significance ( MGUS ) smolder multiple myeloma ( SMM ) define table # . MGUS Serum monoclonal protein level < 3 g/dL > 1.5g/dl , Bone marrow plasma cell < 10 % NonIgG MGUS ( ie IgA , IgM , IgD MGUS ) Abnormal serum free light chain ratio ( ie ratio kappt lambda free light chain < 0.26 > 1.65 ) Absence endorgan damage , lytic bone lesion , anemia , hypercalcemia , renal failure , attribute plasma cell proliferative disorder SMM ( also refer asymptomatic multiple myeloma ) Serum monoclonal protein ( IgG IgA ) level > 3 g/dL , /or bone marrow plasma cell > 10 % , absence endorgan damage , lytic bone lesion , anemia , hypercalcemia , renal failure , attribute plasma cell proliferative disorder Participants must least 18 year old . Because dose adverse event data currently available use RR participant < 18 year age , child exclude study . The effect RR develop human fetus unknown . For reason , woman become pregnant suspect pregnant participating study , inform treat physician immediately . Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document . Participants exhibit follow condition screen eligible admission study . Participants concurrent active cancer active cancer last 5 year ineligible . Participants serious unstable illness , determine study physician clinician , may deem unfit participate . Participants current bipolar psychotic disorder active symptom treatment within last 5 year exclude . Participants exclude currently take ( within last 6 month ) psychoactive medication ( e.g . mood stabilizer , antipsychotic ) , exception hypnotic antidepressant , permit . Participants may receive study agent .
